articles.author: Steve Contorno
articles.title: Trump is teasing US expansion into Panama, Greenland and Canada - CNN
articles.description: President-elect Donald Trump appears to be entertaining an American territorial expansion that, if he’s serious, would rival the Louisiana Purchase or the deal that netted Alaska from Russia.
articles.content:
President-elect Donald Trump appears to be entertaining an American territorial expansion that, if hes serious, would rival the Louisiana Purchase or the deal that netted Alaska from Russia.
